alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Haywood; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 1:09AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tipton, northwestern Fayette, southwestern Haywood and northeastern Shelby Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 108 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brighton, or 9 miles southwest of Covington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Arlington, Munford, Brighton, Tipton, Atoka, Oakland, Mason, Gallaway, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Braden, Barretville, Egypt, Belmont, Redwood, Rosemark, Turnpike and Idaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
